document.full_text: pope benedict, in his easter message to the world, on sunday lamented that the day's joy was marred by war in libya and urged europe to welcome desperate migrants fleeing strife in north africa.
document.title: welcome migrants fleeing strife: pope
lines_and_colors: pope benedict, in his easter message to the world, on sunday lamented that the day's joy was marred by war in libya and urged europe to welcome desperate migrants fleeing strife in north africa.
